Own Choice from a Specified List
Bank Hall Grounds, Burnley, Lancashire, England, UK March: 1. Colne, 2. Nelson Choice of test pieces: "Echoes of the Opera" or "Der Wildschutz". Prizes - 1st £20, 2nd £10, 3rd £5, 4th £2. 8 bands competed.
